titleStmt.title: The mastiue, or Young-whelpe of the olde-dogge Epigrams and satyrs.
titleStmt.author: Parrot, Henry.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho: Creede, for Richard Meighen, and Thomas Iones, and are to be solde at S. Clements Church, without Temple-Barre,

notesStmt.note: "To the vniuersall reader" signed: H.P., i.e. Henry Parrot.
First word of title is xylographic.
The date is cropped in most copies.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
